item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Barbara Taylor Bradford
item.description: "We are each the authors of our own lives, Emma. We live in what we have created. There is no way to shift the blame and no one else to accept the accolades." -- Barbara Taylor Bradford

item.title: Maryam add a quote by قیصر امین پور
item.description:
"شهیدی که برخاک می‌خفت
سرانگشت در خون خود می‌زد و می‌نوشت
به امید پیروزی واقعی
نه در جنگ
که بر جنگ" -- قیصر امین پور
